languages.text: "Помнишь последнего мутанта с публичной казни? С ним было что-то не так помимо физического уродства".
languages.translation_comment: привязать каунтер FW_CorruptionClues к FW_Moralite_dialogue, но НЕ ПОКАЗЫВАТЬ этот ансвер, если к этому моменту успели найти хотя бы одну страницу из Хроники Судеб (отметим этюдом FW_Clue_BookOfFate).

привязать каунтер FW_CorruptionClues к FW_Moralite_dialogue, но НЕ ПОКАЗЫВАТЬ этот ансвер, если к этому моменту успели найти хотя бы одну страницу из Хроники Судеб (отметим этюдом FW_Clue_BookOfFate).

languages.text: "Remember the last mutant from the public execution? Something was off about him, and it wasn't just the physical deformity."
languages.original_text: "Помнишь последнего мутанта с публичной казни? С ним было что-то не так помимо физического уродства".

traits.locale_text: "Remember the last mutant from the public execution? Something was off about him and it wasn't just the physical deformity."
"Remember the last mutant from the public execution? Something was off about him and it wasn't just the physical deformity."
"Remember the last mutant from the public execution? Something was off about him, and it wasn't just the physical deformity."
"Remember the last mutant from the public execution? Something was off about him, and it wasn't just the physical deformity."
"Remember the last mutant from the public execution? Something was off about him, and it wasn't just the physical deformity."
"Remember the last mutant from the public execution? Something was off about him, and it wasn't just the physical deformity."

languages.text: "Erinnert Ihr Euch an den letzten Mutanten von der öffentlichen Hinrichtung? Irgendetwas hat an ihm nicht gestimmt, und es war nicht nur seine körperliche Entstellung."
languages.original_text: "Remember the last mutant from the public execution? Something was off about him, and it wasn't just the physical deformity."

traits.locale_text: "Erinnert Ihr Euch an den letzten Mutanten von der öffentlichen Hinrichtung? Irgendetwas hat an ihm nicht gestimmt, und es war nicht nur seine körperliche Entstellung."

languages.text: « Vous vous souvenez du dernier mutant exécuté en public ? Il y avait quelque chose d'étrange chez lui, et je ne parle pas seulement de ses difformités physiques. »
languages.original_text: "Remember the last mutant from the public execution? Something was off about him, and it wasn't just the physical deformity."

traits.locale_text: « Vous vous souvenez du dernier mutant exécuté en public ? Il y avait quelque chose d'étrange chez lui, et je ne parle pas seulement de ses difformités physiques. »

languages.text: 「公開処刑で最後に出てきた変異体を覚えているか？あいつには何かがおかしかった。体が奇形だったというだけではない」
languages.original_text: "Remember the last mutant from the public execution? Something was off about him, and it wasn't just the physical deformity."

traits.locale_text: 「公開処刑で最後に出てきた変異体を覚えているか？あいつには何かがおかしかった。体が奇形だったというだけではない」

languages.text: «¿Recuerda al último mutante de la ejecución pública? Había algo en él que no encajaba, y no me refiero a su deformidad física».
languages.original_text: "Remember the last mutant from the public execution? Something was off about him, and it wasn't just the physical deformity."

traits.locale_text: «¿Recuerda al último mutante de la ejecución pública? Había algo en él que no encajaba, y no me refiero a su deformidad física».

languages.text: “还记得那个遭到公开处决的变种人吗？他有点不太对劲，我指的不仅仅是躯体方面的畸变。”
languages.original_text: "Remember the last mutant from the public execution? Something was off about him, and it wasn't just the physical deformity."

traits.locale_text: “还记得那个遭到公开处决的变种人吗？他有点不太对劲，我指的不仅仅是躯体方面的畸变。”

languages.text: "Halka açık infazdaki son mutantı hatırlıyor musun? Bir tuhaftı. Sebebi bedeni de değil, başka bir şeydi."
languages.original_text: "Remember the last mutant from the public execution? Something was off about him, and it wasn't just the physical deformity."

traits.locale_text: "Halka açık infazdaki son mutantı hatırlıyor musun? Bir tuhaftı. Sebebi bedeni de değil, başka bir şeydi."
